Module imagingbook.calibrate.lib
Package imagingbook.calibration.zhang

Class Calibrator.Parameters

java.lang.Object
imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Calibrator.Parameters
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParameterBundle<Calibrator>
Enclosing class:
Calibrator
public static class Calibrator.Parameters extends Object implements ParameterBundle<Calibrator>
Inner class representing a set of parameters for instantiating new objects of type of Calibrator. Parameters can be specified by setting the associated public fields.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    boolean
    assumeZeroSkew
    Assume that the camera has no skew (currently not used).
    boolean
    debug
    Turn on debugging output.
    int
    lensDistortionKoeffients
    Number of lens distortion coefficients (2 = simple polynomial model).
    boolean
    normalizePointCoordinates
    Normalize point coordinates for numerical stability in HomographyEstimator.
    boolean
    useNumericJacobian
    Use numeric (instead of analytic) calculation of the Jacobian in NonlinearOptimizer.
